reviewText: Does a good job of covering this long race.  Interesting to see the different lighting as the race progresses.  The pit stop scenes show how well organized and efficient the crews are.  At the very end of the movie, it seemed sort of rushed with interviews of racers and race people, who were not shown, while the race / post-race was shown.
It's LeMans, how could it not be Great!
Father's Day present from boy's to Dad - he LOVED the videos!
